snippet: LEANDER--Tom, 61, died March 19. Son of Elaine and Doug Leander, step-son of Howard Taylor, Tom grew up in New York City. He attended Elisabeth Irwin and Ithaca College. A business journalist, he lived in Brooklyn. Tom moved to Hong Kong in 1998. He was Asia Editor-in-Chief for Lloyd's List. In 2004, he wed Rose Winstanley of Maladpad, Philippines, and became the devoted "Tiyo" to her daughters. This beautiful family was the center of his life. Tom is survived by his wife, daughters Mary Rose Winstanley and Jennifer (Rodrigo) Winstanley-Santa, seven siblings, relatives, and friends. Contact: missingtom leander@gmail.com 1/3

In 2004, he wed Rose Winstanley of Maladpad, Philippines, and became the devoted "Tiyo" to her daughters. This beautiful family was the center of his life. Tom is survived by his wife, daughters Mary Rose Winstanley and Jennifer (Rodrigo) Winstanley-Santa, seven siblings, relatives, and friends. Contact: missingtom leander@gmail.com 1/3
